sentences.en: After the operation you may find it difficult to chew and swallow.
sentences.cn: 手术后你咀嚼和吞咽都会感到困难。

sentences.en: Always chew food well before swallowing it.
sentences.cn: 什么食物都要先嚼碎再吞咽。

sentences.en: Be certain to eat slowly and chew your food extremely well.
sentences.cn: 一定要慢慢吃，要细细咀嚼。

sentences.en: Chew each mouthful fully before the next bite.
sentences.cn: 将每一口充分咀嚼后，再吃下一口。

sentences.en: Chew your food point by point.
Chew your food well and do not rush meals.
sentences.cn: 充分咀嚼食物，吃饭不要太快。

sentences.en: Chew your food well before you swallow it.
sentences.cn: 食物在吞咽前要仔细咀嚼.

sentences.en: Don't bite off more than you can chew.
executives met to chew over the company's future.
sentences.cn: 主管人员会面详细讨论公司的未来。

sentences.en: he chewed me out for being late.
sentences.cn: 他因为我迟到而训了我。

sentences.en: He tends to chew things over too much in his mind.
sentences.cn: 他这个人就爱在心里反复琢磨事儿。

sentences.en: Let me chew it over for a few days.
Savour the flavour of each mouthful, and chew your food well.
sentences.cn: 细细品尝每一口的味道，充分咀嚼。

sentences.en: The greens are full of fibres that you can't chew.
They pause and chew their pencils.
sentences.cn: 他们停了下来，咬着铅笔。

sentences.en: This candy is so hard that no one can chew it.
sentences.cn: 这种糖太硬,没人嚼得动.

sentences.en: This meat’s so tough I can hardly chew it!
sentences.cn: 这肉太老了，我几乎嚼不动！
我们将仔细考虑你的建议.

sentences.en: You should chew over this thing.
sentences.cn: 你应当好好思量这件事.

words.tran_cn: 柔软而会黏着的；难嚼的

phrases.tran_cn: 详细讨论（某事）；对（某事）深思熟虑

phrases.phrase: chew the fat 或 chew the rag &I{【俚语】}
phrases.tran_cn: 聊天：友好轻松地一起交谈；很长时间地聊天

trans.tran_en: the act of biting something many times with your teeth
to bite food several times before swallowing it
to bite food several times before swallowing it
to bite food several times before swallowing it
